The English idiom "Kowtow" is the closest match, as it implies showing excessive respect or deference, often in a way that is considered insincere or servile. The idiom "Bow" is a good match, but it's more literal and doesn't convey the same level of respect or deference as किसी के सामने हाथ जोड़ना (भाव).
